description: This rule will monitor executable and script file creation by office applications. Please add more file extensions or magic bytes to the logic of your choice.
name: Created Files by Office Applications
query: ((process.executable:(*\\winword.exe OR *\\excel.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe) AND file.path:(*.exe OR *.dll OR *.ocx OR *.com OR *.ps1 OR *.vbs OR *.sys OR *.bat OR *.scr OR *.proj)) AND (NOT ((file.path:*C\:\\Users\\* AND file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Office\\* AND file.path:*\\WebServiceCache\\AllUsers* AND file.path:*.com) OR (process.executable:*\\winword.exe AND file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\webexdelta\\* AND file.path:(*.dll OR *.exe)) OR (file.path:*\\AppData\\Local\\assembly\\tmp\\* AND file.path:*.dll))))
author: Vadim Khrykov (ThreatIntel)
Cyb3rEng (Rule)
